events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience with software development and devops.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be your point of contact moving forward in the hiring process.
You have passed the initial screening phase, and we are impressed with your background in software engineering and devops practices.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions. Your enthusiasm for the role is well noted.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare to discuss your experience with software engineering and devops tools.
